Title: UNDSS, Chad consul general visit theatre command, pland end to insurgency
Summary: The Chief Security Adviser for the United Nations Department of Safety and Security (UNDSS) Nigeria, Mr Senyo Kufe, and the Consul General of the Republic of Chad in Maiduguri, Mr Bisso Youssouf Mbodou Mbami, have called for deeper collaboration to end insurgency .

Title: DSS charges man over social media coup calls, files six-count suit in Abuja
Summary: DSS charged Innocent Onukwume for allegedly advocating a military takeover and publishing inflammatory content online . DSS filed six-count suit in Abuja on 11 November 2025 .

Title: FG begins payment of three-year salary arrears to 1,700 college teachers
Summary: FG begins payment of three-year salary arrears to 1,700 college teachers . After six years of waiting, teachers and education officers in Federal Unity Colleges have begun receiving payments . The Guardian can authoritatively report .

Title: Taraba govt launches training on hygienic meat handling
Summary: Taraba govt. reaffirms commitment to promoting hygiene, sanitation, and modern meat processing practices . Speaking on Wednesday in Jalingo, the state capital, at least one of the state’s agricultural sector .

Title: Ogun police foil robbery attempt in Sagamu, recovers vehicle
Summary: Ogun State Police Command has foiled a robbery attempt in Sagamu area of the state following a swift and coordinated intervention . Police recovered a vehicle from the scene of the robbery attempt .

Title: Messi return ‘unrealistic’, says Barca president Laporta
Summary: Laporta says he does not regret what happened because "Barca is above everything" The president, who was in charge at the time of Messi's departure, said he did not regret it .

Title: DSS files charges against social media user who called for coup
Summary: Onukwume committed offences contrary to and punishable under Sections 46 A (1), and 59 (1) of the Criminal Code Act .

Title: Kwankwaso’s ally, Koki, dumps NNPP
Summary: Koki cited the issue of the internal crisis rocking the NNPP party leadership at the centre as the reason for his resignation from the party .

Title: Trump claims ‘obligation’ to sue BBC over speech edit
Summary: Trump claims ‘obligation’ to sue BBC over speech edit . "I guess I have to, why not?" said the president in his first public comments .

Title: ASUU NEC warns FG against delay in renegotiation
Summary: The NEC expressed regret that the government continues to treat education as a commercial venture rather than a social good . Education is essential for sustainable national development, NEC said .
